title: Store Directory | Hobby Lobby
text: States that start with A through IA-I - AlabamaStore quantity: (28) - ArizonaStore quantity: (25) - ArkansasStore quantity: (16) - CaliforniaStore quantity: (69) - ColoradoStore quantity: (21) - ConnecticutStore quantity: (6) - DelawareStore quantity: (4) - FloridaStore quantity: (59) - GeorgiaStore quantity: (47) - IdahoStore quantity: (8) - IllinoisStore quantity: (42) - IndianaStore quantity: (29) - IowaStore quantity: (20) States that start with K through MK-M - KansasStore quantity: (15) - KentuckyStore quantity: (23) - LouisianaStore quantity: (19) - MaineStore quantity: (4) - MarylandStore quantity: (10) - MassachusettsStore quantity: (9) - MichiganStore quantity: (37) - MinnesotaStore quantity: (19) - MississippiStore quantity: (15) - MissouriStore quantity: (27) - MontanaStore quantity: (6) States that start with N through ON-O - NebraskaStore quantity: (12) - NevadaStore quantity: (7) - New HampshireStore quantity: (7) - New JerseyStore quantity: (19) - New MexicoStore quantity: (12) - New YorkStore quantity: (29) - North CarolinaStore quantity: (42) - North DakotaStore quantity: (5) - OhioStore quantity: (44) - OklahomaStore quantity: (28) - OregonStore quantity: (9) States that start with P through WP-W - PennsylvaniaStore quantity: (31) - Rhode IslandStore quantity: (1) - South CarolinaStore quantity: (26) - South DakotaStore quantity: (6) - TennesseeStore quantity: (32) - TexasStore quantity: (120) - UtahStore quantity: (12) - VermontStore quantity: (1) - VirginiaStore quantity: (21) - WashingtonStore quantity: (19) - West VirginiaStore quantity: (9) - WisconsinStore quantity: (28) - WyomingStore quantity: (3) Founded in 1972, Hobby Lobby is one of the largest arts and crafts retailers in the USA – if not the world- with over 950 stores. Your local store has a vast selection of products to explore including home décor, fabrics and sewing accessories, DIY crafting materials, art supplies, floral accessories, yarn, and baking supplies, our Hobby Lobby stores have everything you need to transform your home. Creative enthusiasts and DIY hobbyists alike can immerse themselves in a world of artistic inspiration and curated home décor. Look for seasonal decorations and inspiration year-round. Explore weekly ads, special promotions, directions, and opening hours at one of our 950+ locations.
